players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. Bob"
Charlie: "Will do, Bob. I'll keep Diana under watch."
Diana: "Thanks for the watch, Charlie. Stay alert!"
You: "Charlie watching Diana? Good choice, keep an eye on her."
Charlie: "Will keep close watch on Diana. Stay vigilant, everyone."
Diana: "Will keep a low profile, staying alert. Trust Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. Bob"
You: "Will do, Bob. I'll keep Diana under watch."
Diana: "Thanks for the watch, Charlie. Stay alert!"
Bob: "Charlie watching Diana? Good choice, keep an eye on her."
You: "Will keep close watch on Diana. Stay vigilant, everyone."
Diana: "Will keep a low profile, staying alert. Trust Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
